context: Hi how are you What type of movies do you like ?!

Yeah lovee it !!! Have you seen Jumanji (2017)
Yes I have, i personally think original Jumanji (1995) is so much better.

You like Adam Sandler?? It’s a about a family going on vacation but the kids are bad lol
He has some good movies, not all though.
But it’s there adventure of the vacation Yeah ! I really like Eight Crazy Nights (2002)
resp: I think Eight Crazy Nights (2002) was a finer one in the collection!
